page.title: 12 Industry in Seaton
page.content:
There is not much industry in the Axe Valley but there are a few firms:
Firstly,{RACAL}the big electric company which employs 220 people which come down from the towns and cities. RACAL make telephones and walkie talkies for the army and navy. RACAL made a radio telephone for the famous explorer Chris Bonnington who ascended Mount Everest.
{ Seaton Marine Services}came to Seaton 2 years ago. They sell diving masks, knives, equipment and boats.
Just up the road is{Bradfords,}a building merchants. They store cement, timber and bricks etc. Bradfords are known throughout Britain as building merchants. {Continued On Page 13 ]
